text:
rudra rIriShaH || 
mA na#stOqkE tana#yEq mA naq Ayu#Shiq mA nOq gOShuq mA nOq aSvE#Shu rIriShaH | 
vIqrAn mAnO# rudra BAmiqtO va#dhIr. haqviShma#ntOq nama#sA vidhEma tE || 
AqrAttE# gOqGna uqta pU#ruShaqGnE kShaqyadvI#rAya suqmnamaqsmE tE# astu | 
rakShA# ca nOq adhi# ca dEva brUqhyadhA# ca naqH Sarma# yacCa dviqbar.hA$H || 
stuqhi - [  ] 23
